title: Ensure category tags are lowercase in chatrooms

requirements.summary: Convert category display text to lowercase in the ChatroomPage component where category tags are rendered
acceptanceCriteria: Category tags displayed in the chatroom view show lowercase text
Styling matches the existing LIVE badge format (padding, font size)

file_operations.description: Update the category badge rendering to display lowercase text using .toLowerCase() on the category value. Ensure the badge styling (px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300) matches the existing LIVE badge format from ChatroomCard.tsx and LobbyPage.tsx for visual consistency.
